right.item:
PKU gel

A phenylalanine free gel or drink for use in the dietary management of Phenylketonuria in children from 12 months to 10 years of age.

PKU express

A phenylalanine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Phenylketonuria in individuals aged 8 years and older.

PKU cooler 10

A phenylalanine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Phenylketonuria in people aged 3 years and older.

PKU cooler 15

A phenylalanine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Phenylketonuria in people aged 3 years and older.

PKU cooler 20

A phenylalanine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Phenylketonuria in people aged 3 years and older.
